publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3615 Tommy Sheridan: Support Striking Public Sector Workers—That the Parliament notes the involvement of hospital workers in north Glasgow and firefighters across Scotland in strike action in pursuit of improved gradings, wages and working conditions and further notes the meeting taking place on Thursday 21 November 2002, at 3:30pm in the Scottish Parliament’s Committee Room 2 at which striking hospital workers from north Glasgow will attend to present their case along with representatives of the fire brigades union and that a financial collection in support of these workers will be held.
